title: "Acceleration Consortium applies artificial intelligence to discovery of advanced materials"
excerpt: "The Acceleration Consortium, a new global collaboration between academia, industry and government, based at the University of Toronto, will use artificial intelligence and robotics to accelerate the design and discovery of materials that don't yet exist."
